analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Narūpiṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na rūpim na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca rūpī sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Narūpiṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: na rūpim na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca rūpī anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe

original: Naarūpiṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na arūpim na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca rūpī anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
